author: Madurai Bureau
text:
Deputy Superintendent of Police A.C. Vellaiyan distributing juice to traffic constables in Sivakasi on Sunday.

Traffic police personnel who have been sweating it out under scorching sun were given lime juice/ buttermilk and fruits here on Sunday.

A sachet containing 200 ml of lemon juice was distributed to police personnel in Dindigul in the morning, afternoon and evening.

Traffic police personnel in Vedasandur received buttermilk and water melon.

Already, metallic shelters were erected at prime junctions in Dindigul city for the police personnel to stand while regulating traffic.

Giant umbrellas were also provided for them at some places.

Masks were given to them to protect themselves from air pollution.

Virudhunagar

Distribution of lemon juice and butter to the traffic police personnel of nine traffic police stations in the district began on Sunday.

The Deputy Superintendents of Police inaugurated the distribution of juices to help the traffic police personnel beat the heat waves as signs of early setting of summer have been witnessed in the last few days.

In a statement, the Virudhunagar Superintendent of Police, P. Aravindhan, said that the juice and buttermilk would be served to them throughout the summer.
title: Juice, buttermilk for traffic police
